cssCode.#text: body, html { background-color:  #faf9f6; font-family: montserrat, sans-serif; margin: 0; max-width: 100%; padding: 0; overflow-x: hidden; scroll-behavior: smooth; scrollbar-color: rgba(155, 155, 155, 0.7) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); scrollbar-width: thin; } nav { align-items: center; background-color:  #faf9f6; display: flex; height: 60px; justify-content: space-between; max-width: 100%; padding: 1rem 0 1rem 1rem !important; z-index: 1; } ul { list-style: none; padding: 0; } .links { align-items: center; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-left: 1rem; margin-right: 25%; min-width: 700px; width: 50%; } .menu { background-color: initial; border: none; cursor: pointer; display: none; padding: 0; position: absolute; right: 1.5rem; width: 4rem; } .logo:hover { cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transform: scale(1.1); transition: all 0.25s ease-in-out; } .links-li a, .links-li a:visited { color: #000; font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 400; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; position: relative; text-decoration: none; transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; } .links a:hover { color: grey; } .links a:hover::before, .links a::before { background-color: rgb(75, 75, 75); bottom: 0; content: ''; height: 2px; left: 50%; position: absolute; transform: translateX(-50%); transition: all 0.25s ease-in-out; width: 0; } .links a:hover::before { width: 100%; } .logo img { height: 68px; } #style-AM5Zm.style-AM5Zm { transition: top 0.3s ease; }

body { font-family:montserrat,sans-serif; } * { font-family: montserrat,sans-serif; } * { font-family: montserrat, sans-serif; } body { background-color: #faf9f6; background-color: var(--white-color); font-family: montserrat,sans-serif; margin: 0; max-width: 100%; padding: 0; } body { background-color: var(--white-color); font-family: montserrat, sans-serif; margin: 0px; max-width: 100%; padding: 0px; } html { background-color: #faf9f6; background-color: var(--white-color); overflow-x: hidden; scroll-behavior: smooth; scrollbar-color: #9b9b9bb3 #0000; scrollbar-width: thin; } html { background-color: var(--white-color); overflow-x: hidden; scroll-behavior: smooth; scrollbar-color: rgba(155, 155, 155, 0.7) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); scrollbar-width: thin; } :root { --secondary-color: #2e3c40; --primary-color: #e2ba5a; --white-color: #faf9f6; } @media (max-width: 1350px){ .page-contain { padding: 0 5% 4rem!important; } } .page-contain { align-items: center; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; font-family: Open Sans,sans-serif; font-style: none; justify-content: center; padding: 0 10% 4rem; } .page-contain { align-items: center; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; justify-content: center; padding: 0px 10% 4rem; } @media (max-width: 1350px){ .data-card { height: 18vw!important; padding: 1rem!important; width: 16vw!important; } } .data-card { background: hsla(0,1%,86%,.598); -webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 92%,0 100%); clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 92%,0 100%); display: block; flex-direction: column; margin: 1vw; min-height: 14vw; overflow: hidden; padding: 2.75em 1.5em; text-decoration: none; transition: transform .45s ease,background .45s ease; width: 10vw; } .data-card { background: rgba(220, 219, 219, 0.596); clip-path: polygon(0px 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 92%, 0px 100%); display: block; flex-direction: column; margin: 1vw; min-height: 14vw; overflow: hidden; padding: 2.75em 1.5em; text-decoration: none; transition: transform 0.45s ease 0s, background 0.45s ease 0s; width: 10vw; } .data-card:hover { background: #e2ba5a; background: var(--primary-color); transform: scale(1.02); } .data-card:hover { background: var(--primary-color); transform: scale(1.02); } .data-card:active,.data-card:hover { background: #e2ba5a; background: var(--primary-color); transform: scale(1.02); } .data-card:active,.data-card:hover { background: var(--primary-color); transform: scale(1.02); } .data-card:nth-child(3) { -webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 100%,0 93%); clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 100%,0 93%); } .data-card:nth-child(3) { clip-path: polygon(0px 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 100%, 0px 93%); } .data-card:nth-child(4) { -webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 100%,0 87%); clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 100%,0 87%); } .data-card:nth-child(4) { clip-path: polygon(0px 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 100%, 0px 87%); } .logo:hover { cursor: pointer; opacity: .8; transform: scale(1.1); -webkit-transform: scale(1.1); transition: all .25s ease-in-out; } .logo:hover { cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transform: scale(1.1); transition: all 0.25s ease-in-out 0s; } .data-card:first-child { -webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 100%,0 90%); clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 100%,0 90%); } .data-card:first-child { clip-path: polygon(0px 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 100%, 0px 90%); } @media (max-width: 1350px){ .data-card h4  { font-size: .8em!important; } } .data-card h4  { color: #627084; font-size: 1em; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: .1em; line-height: 1; margin: 0 0 1.777777778em; text-transform: uppercase; transition: color .45s ease; } .data-card h4  { color: rgb(98, 112, 132); font-size: 1em; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 0.1em; line-height: 1; margin: 0px 0px 1.77778em; text-transform: uppercase; transition: color 0.45s ease 0s; } .data-card p  { color: #faf9f6; color: var(--white-color); font-size: .9em; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.1; margin: 0 0 1.25em; opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-1em); transition: opacity .45s ease,transform .5s ease; } .data-card p  { color: var(--white-color); font-size: 0.9em; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.1; margin: 0px 0px 1.25em; opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-1em); transition: opacity 0.45s ease 0s, transform 0.5s ease 0s; } .link-text { display: none; } .data-card .link-text  { color: #e5b23e; font-size: 1em; font-weight: 600; line-height: .9; margin: auto 0 0; transition: color .45s ease; } .data-card .link-text  { color: rgb(229, 178, 62); font-size: 1em; font-weight: 600; line-height: 0.9; margin: auto 0px 0px; transition: color 0.45s ease 0s; } h3 { max-width: 100%; overflow: hidden; } @media (max-width: 1350px){ .data-card h3  { font-size: 2em!important; padding: 0 0 .142857143em!important; } } .data-card h3  { border-bottom: 2px solid #e5b23e; color: #2e3c40; color: var(--secondary-color); font-size: 3em; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1; margin: 0 0 .142857143em; padding-bottom: .5em; transition: color .45s ease,border .45s ease; } .data-card h3  { border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(229, 178, 62); color: var(--secondary-color); font-size: 3em; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1; margin: 0px 0px 0.142857em; padding-bottom: 0.5em; transition: color 0.45s ease 0s, border 0.45s ease 0s; } .data-card:hover h3  { border-bottom-color: #e5b23e; } .data-card:hover h3  { color: #faf9f6; color: var(--white-color); } .data-card:hover h3  { border-bottom-color: rgb(229, 178, 62); } .data-card:hover h3  { color: var(--white-color); } .data-card:hover h4  { color: #faf9f6; color: var(--white-color); } .data-card:hover h4  { color: var(--white-color); } .data-card:hover p  { opacity: 1; transform: none; } .data-card:hover .link-text  { color: #faf9f6; color: var(--white-color); } .data-card:hover .link-text  { color: var(--white-color); } .data-card .link-text svg  { margin-left: .5em; transition: transform .6s ease; } .data-card .link-text svg  { margin-left: 0.5em; transition: transform 0.6s ease 0s; } .data-card:hover .link-text svg  { animation: point 1.25s infinite alternate; } .data-card:hover .link-text svg  { animation: 1.25s ease 0s infinite alternate none running point; } @keyframes point { 0% { transform: translateX(0px); transform: translateX(0px); } 100% { transform: translateX(0.1em); transform: translateX(0.1em); } }
